chapter.p: 1The word of Yahweh that came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning the Philistines beforeLiterally “at not yet” Pharaoh attacked Gaza. 2Thus says Yahweh:

ul.li1: “Look, waters are rising from the north,
ul.li2: and they will become as a raging torrent,
ul.li1: and they will overflow the land,
ul.li2: the city and those who live in it.
ul.li1: And the people will cry out,
ul.li2: and every inhabitant of the land will wail,
ul.li1: 3from the sound of the stamping of the hoofs of his stallions,
ul.li2: from the clattering of his chariots,Hebrew “chariot”
ul.li1: Fathers do not turn to their children
ul.li2: because of the slackness of their hands.
ul.li1: 4Because of the day that is coming
to cut off from Tyre and from Sidon
for Yahweh is destroying the Philistines,
ul.li2: the remnant of the coastland of Caphtor.
how longLiterally “until when” will you cut yourself with a blade?
how longLiterally “until when” will you not be quiet?
when Yahweh has given an order to it?
ul.li1: Against Ashkelon and against the shore of the sea,
